amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the Under Secretary for Nuclear Security to conduct a study on the unexpected cost increases for the W80-4 nuclear warhead life extension program and sought to limit funding for the program until the study was completed.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 33 printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 to require the Under Secretary for Nuclear Security to conduct a study on the unexpected cost increases for the W80-4 nuclear warhead life extension program and prevents $185 million from being obligated or expended until the study is completed.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 229 (Roll no. 455).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Blumenauer.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 198 - 229 (Roll no. 455).
